message.content:
cs.HC, cs.SE, cs.CY, cs.AI, cs.IR 

This paper focuses on the design and evaluation of a Machine Learning model to predict support ticket escalations in large software organizations. The study involves understanding the support process and data available to support analysts, which falls under the category of Human-Computer Interaction (cs.HC) and Software Engineering (cs.SE). The use of Machine Learning techniques to predict escalations also falls under the categories of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI) and Information Retrieval (cs.IR). Finally, the paper discusses the features developed in the Support Ticket Model, which could be useful for organizations interested in implementing similar models, which falls under the category of Cybersecurity (cs.CY).
